name: Husbands and Knives
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Matt Selman
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: When Marge becomes a successful businesswoman, Homer becomes worried that she will dump him for a trophy husband. Therefore, he decides to have plastic surgery to make himself look like a hunk.
